cause.description:
The Military Commissions Act of 2006 gives the president absolute power to decide who is an enemy of our country and to imprison people indefinitely without charging them with a crime.
1. Position #1
cause.mission: Encourage Congress to pass the 'Restoring the Constitution Act' of 2007 which will restore Habeus Corpus right to those President Bush deems as 'enemy combatants' - who can be anyone he really wants.
cause.name: Support the ACLU and 'Restoring the Constitution Act' of 2007
